file_content.text: You have reached the passage from maintenance to the crew area. Yuun now controls this door and all others, along with all security measures.
You will be the only one able to pass from each room to the next. All Imperials will experience... technical difficulties.
Life-sign scanners show many, many guards within the crew area. The battle to reach the hostages we seek is sure to be fierce, Major--please journey cautiously.
Thanks for the heads-up, Lieutenant.
Will do.
It is Yuun's honor to contribute.
I'm ready for anything.
If you've got full control, couldn't you vent the atmosphere in the guards' rooms?
Can't you thin their numbers?
Unfortunately, the station's systems lack such precision. Yuun could vent the atmosphere from the entire crew area, but this would be undesirable.
Yuun will contact you in case of any developments. Good luck--Yuun out.
Our work reaches full fruition. You may proceed to the crew area access door, Major.
Another success. You are as the landslide obstructing a river's flow, sending its waters into the path we dictate. Our work will soon be complete.
Admirably done, Major. The first system components now fall into our control.
Major. Our landing has concluded successfully without gaining enemy attentions. Yuun is now prepared to carry out this mission's technical requirements.
The terminal Yuun requires lies just outside of our ship. It will grant Yuun preliminary access to the station's security systems.
However, to gain full control, other terminals nearby must be destroyed, so that their functions will be routed here. For this, Yuun relies on you.
I'll find the other terminals and take them out.
Understood.
Huh?
To prevent discovery of our rescue attempt and subsequent injury to the hostages we seek, several terminals here in the maintenance area must be destroyed.
Garza didn't say anything about destroying terminals, Lieutenant.
This isn't part of the plan.
A map does not always show exactly how a path might turn. The signs are clear--we must deviate from the details of our plan to accomplish its essence.
Yuun will ensure that the terminals' destruction goes unnoticed. Do not fear alerting the Imperials.
Yuun is prepared to begin when you are, Major. May our path lead us to victory.
